Diagnostic Testing for Adults

Free GED Testing Preparation

Who we are

Diagnostic Testing For Adults

We give you a 2nd chance.

Diagnostic Testing for Adults is an organization designed to support individuals who have left school without a diploma and give them a second chance. By providing free GED preparation, mentoring, and vocational guidance, our students can achieve a higher potential. We strive to make a positive impact in the community by helping them improve their quality of life, become competent citizens and bridge the literacy gap amongst adults.

Diagnostic Testing for Adults is an organization designed to support individuals who have left school without a diploma and give them a second chance. By providing free GED preparation, mentoring, and vocational guidance, our students can achieve a higher potential. We strive to make a positive impact in the community by helping them improve their quality of life, become competent citizens and bridge the literacy gap amongst adults.

Our services

Free GED Preparation

We offer preparation from www.ged.com testing services covering the four major subjects required by the test.

Career Advice

Whether their goal is to pursue higher education, find meaningful employment or join the military forces. We will provide them with the right resources.

Application Process

We offer guidance through the application processes of signing up for GED testing, employment, and creating a formal resume.
